long_description: The lightweight, highly responsive Rossignol Sin 7 skis use 98mm waists, a rockered profile designed for powder and lightweight construction to take on any conditions Mother Nature can cook up. Float like a feather on top of deep snow thanks to the rockered tips and tails; redesigned Powder Turn rocker minimizes the tendency of tips to flap at high speeds. Standard camber underfoot offers tenacious edge-grip on hardpack; there's more than enough camber to enjoy carving on groomers. Wood core creates a light and lively ski with excellent ski-to-snow feel and high durability. You'll notice remarkable edge grip and playful responsiveness thanks to a sidecut that's centered below the bindings. The Rossignol Sin 7 skis feature 98mm waists that require bindings with wide brakes. Base or topsheet color may vary from photo.
short_description: The lightweight, highly responsive Rossignol Sin 7 skis use 98mm waists, a rockered profile designed for powder and lightweight construction to take on any conditions Mother Nature can cook up.
